Human Generated.Description: This content has been entirely created by a human author.

Machine Generated.Description: This content has been entirely generated by an AI model.

Content Generation.Description: AI algorithms were used to generate specific sections or portions of the article based on predefined criteria or data inputs.

Media Generation.Description: AI generative models were used to create images, videos or visual elements for the article.

Paraphrasing/Rephrasing.Description: AI algorithms were used to assist in rephrasing or paraphrasing certain sections of the article while maintaining the original meaning.

Source Synthesis.Description: AI was employed to synthesize information from multiple sources, analysing and combining data from different references to create the article.

Automated Research.Description: AI performed automated research on a given topic, aggregating and summarizing information from various sources included in the large language model's knowledge.

Topic Generation.Description: AI algorithms were used to suggest or generate topics for the article, assisting in the ideation process.

Language Translation.Description: AI was employed to translate the article from one language to another, assisting with linguistic nuances and idiomatic expressions.

Content Summarization.Description: AI was utilized to condense and summarize a larger piece of content, providing a concise overview.

Grammar Enhancement.Description: AI was used to improve the article's grammar, punctuation, and overall linguistic accuracy.

Content Structure Generation.Description: AI was used to assist in organizing and structuring the article, ensuring logical flow and coherence.
